package.name: sitelen-pona
package.author: niko
package.description: A package for writing UCSUR sitelen pona with Espanso!
package.title: o sitelen pona!

manifest.name: sitelen-pona
manifest.title: o sitelen pona!
manifest.description: A package for writing UCSUR sitelen pona with Espanso!
manifest.author: niko

value.readme:
# o sitelen pona!

A package for writing UCSUR sitelen pona with Espanso.

kepeken ilo ni la sina ken kama e sitelen pona kepeken ilo Espanso. o toki pona la o sitelen pona!

## Usage

**This package is intended for use with Espanso's ["toggle keys" feature](https://espanso.org/docs/configuration/options/#customizing-the-toggle-key)**, and will replace any typed toki pona word to its respective sitelen pona.

## Words

All pu and ku suli words are supported by this package,
as well as *select* ku lili and "su."

The additional ku lili are listed below:

- isipin
- kapesi
- kiki
- linluwi, linuwi (will result in the same glyph)
- mulapisu
- pake
- Pingo
- powe
- unu
- wa

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  # punctuation etc
  - triggers: ["zz", "  "]
    replace: "　" # ! changed to logograph fullwidth space
    word: true

  - trigger: "-"
    replace: "‍" # ! changed to zero width non joiner
    word: true

  - trigger: "^"
    replace: "󱦕" # ! changed to stacking joiner
    word: true

  - trigger: "*"
    replace: "󱦖" # ! changed to scaling joiner
    word: true

  - trigger: ":"
    replace: "󱦝" # ! changed to sp colon
    word: true

  - trigger: "."
    replace: "󱦜" # ! changed to sp full stop 
    word: true

  - trigger: "["
    replace: "󱦐" # ! changed to cartouche start
    word: true

  - trigger: "]"
    replace: "󱦑" # ! changed to cartouche end
    word: true

  - trigger: "<"
    replace: "「" # ! changed to cjk start quote
    word: true

  - trigger: ">"
    replace: "」" # ! changed to cjk end quote
    word: true

  - trigger: "("
    replace: "󱦗" # ! changed to "start left-combining (normal) long glyph"
    word: true

  - trigger: ")"
    replace: "󱦘" # ! changed to "end left-combining (normal) long glyph"  
    word: true

  - trigger: "{"
    replace: "󱦚" # ! changed to "start right-combining (reversed) long glyph"
    word: true

  - trigger: "}"
    replace: "󱦛" # ! changed to "end right-combining (reversed) long glyph" 
    word: true

  # contractions
  - triggers: ["msa", "misonala", "misonaala"]
    replace: "󱤴󱥡󱤂"
    word: true

  # pu
  - trigger: "a"
    replace: "󱤀"
    word: true

  - trigger: "aaa"
    replace: "󱤀󱤀󱤀"
    word: true

  - trigger: "akesi"
    replace: "󱤁"
    word: true

    replace: "󱤂"
    word: true

    word: true

    word: true

    word: true
